meanings.definition: Not put into effect or practice.
meanings.sent1: The unimplemented plan caused confusion among the team.
meanings.sent2: The unimplemented software update led to security vulnerabilities.
meanings.sent3: The unimplemented idea of having a pizza party left everyone disappointed.
meanings.sent4: Her unimplemented dream of traveling the world remained just a fantasy.
meanings.sent5: The unimplemented project loomed over them like a dark cloud.

meanings.sent1: The unimplemented task was still pending on his to-do list.
meanings.sent2: The unimplemented construction project left the building unfinished.
meanings.sent3: The unimplemented promise to go to the park made the kids sad.
meanings.sent4: His unimplemented goal of running a marathon seemed out of reach.
meanings.sent5: The unimplemented puzzle sat on the table, waiting to be solved.
